channel.title: Gamegrame error..or...?
channel.description:
When I turn fog on and off I get this weird space that shows up on the client screen.
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2m31g7q.png[/img]
Im using a PI source and client. Any ideas?

item.title: Gamegrame error..or...?
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:4, topic:541053”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=659922.msg4412640#msg4412640 date=1394400290]
its a 1pixel offset of where the fog is being drawn. you just need to modify the location of some of the game frame or extend the viewport another pixel
[/quote]
or decrease the fog by a pixel lol.[/quote]

I could do that, but then I would still have the +1 pixel on the gameframe.


Still not solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Gamegrame error..or...?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Vain_:

its a 1pixel offset of where the fog is being drawn. you just need to modify the location of some of the game frame or extend the viewport another pixel

or decrease the fog by a pixel lol.

item.title: Gamegrame error..or...?
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Vain_:

its a 1pixel offset of where the fog is being drawn. you just need to modify the location of some of the game frame or extend the viewport another pixel

How would I go about doing something such as that?
